00009 static double hb[3276800];
00010 static int hp[3276800];
00011 
00012 // new fitted values 
00013 const double pdf_mean = 60.8;
00014 const double pdf_rms = 23.89;
00015 const double spe_mean  = 69;
00016 const double spe_sigma = 19.914;
00017 const double exp_tau = 26.847;
00018 const double P_E = 0.1091;

00035 int MCLaserData::Start_Run()
00036 { 
00037   Message(INFO) << "MCLaserData Start \n";
00038 
00039   histPMT = &hb[0];
00040   barePMT = &hp[0];
00041 
00042   mc_written = 0;
00043 
00044   std::stringstream filename;
00045   filename<<"Run"<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<the_params.mch_run_number;
00046 
00047   mcwriter->SetFilename(filename.str().c_str());
00048   mcwriter->Initialize();
00049   mcwriter->SetRunID(the_params.mch_run_number);
00050 
00051   //  RunDB::runinfo *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00052   the_runinfo.starttime = time(NULL);
00053   the_runinfo.comment = "MC Laser Data";
00054 
00055   // fser = TFile::Open("mc/R11065_ser.root","READ");
00056   // if(!fser->IsOpen()) {
00057   //   Message(ERROR) << " file mc/R11065.root is missing !!!\n";
00058   //   return -1;
00059   // }
00060 
00061   // hser = (TH1F*) fser->Get("R11065_ser");
00062     
00063   //xxxt, pmt_ser, xtime_start, xtime_end and xtime_ser are global constants defined in mc/include/averageSPE.hh
00064   averageSPE(xxxt, pmt_ser);
00065     
00066   ser_integral = 0.0;
00067   for(int i=xtime_start; i<xtime_end; i++) 
00068   {
00069       //TEMP
00070       //Normalize such that an spe_mean of 69(= ser integral) 
00071       //gives integer values to all samples
00072       pmt_ser[i] = (int)(pmt_ser[i]/4 + 0.5); 
00073       ser_integral += pmt_ser[i];
00074   }
00075   std::cout << " ser integral = " << ser_integral << " counts*bin" << std::endl;
00076 
00077   return 0;
00078 }

00086 
00087 int MCLaserData::Process(EventPtr event)
00088 {
00089     int idx;
00090 
00091   MCRawEventPtr raw(new MCRawEvent);
00092   size_t event_size_bytes = the_params.mch_number_of_channels*the_params.mch_number_of_samples*2;
00093   int blocknum = raw->AddDataBlock(RawEvent::MONTECARLO, event_size_bytes);
00094   buffer = raw->GetRawDataBlock(blocknum);
00095 
00096   EventDataPtr data = event->GetEventData();
00097   std::vector<ChannelData>::iterator chdata;
00098 
00099   int s_start, s_end, s_start_max;
00100   s_start = -1; s_end = -1; s_start_max = -1;
00101 
00102   // clean
00103 
00104   for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00105   {
00106     idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00107     for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) 
00108     {
00109       histPMT[idx+itime]=0.0;
00110       barePMT[idx+itime]=0;
00111     }
00112   }
00113 
00114   if(the_params.mch_baseline != 0) 
00115   {//Fixed baseline + random hits + noise
00116 
00117     // baseline
00118     
00119     for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00120     {
00121         idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00122         for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) 
00123         {
00124             histPMT[idx+itime] += the_params.mch_baseline;
00125         }
00126     }
00127     
00128     // random hits
00129 
00130     if(the_params.mch_single_rate != 0) 
00131     {
00132 
00133       double prob = the_params.mch_single_rate * the_params.mch_sampling_time * 1.0e-9;
00134       Message(WARNING) << "single_rate <> 0 !!\n";
00135       for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00136       {
00137           idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00138           for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) 
00139           {
00140               if(ran.Uniform() < prob) 
00141                   barePMT[idx+itime] += 1.0;
00142           }
00143       }
00144       
00145     }
00146     
00147     // noise
00148 
00149     double low, up;
00150     for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00151     {
00152         double noise_level = 0.0;
00153         idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00154         for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) 
00155         {
00156             //Noise model from WARP
00157             low = -2.0 - (noise_level-5.0)/5.0;
00158             up = low+2.0;
00159             noise_level += ran.Uniform(low, up);
00160 
00161             //Gaussian noise model
00162             //noise_level = ran.Gaus(0, 1.5);
00163             
00164             histPMT[idx+itime] += noise_level;
00165         }
00166     }
00167     
00168   } 
00169 
00170   else 
00171   {// Use baseline from random triggers in background run
00172       
00173       for(chdata = data->channels.begin() ; chdata != data->channels.end(); chdata++)
00174       {
00175           int id = chdata->channel_id;
00176           if(id < 0) continue;
00177           if(id >= the_params.mch_number_of_channels) continue;
00178           int nsamps = chdata->nsamps;
00179           if(nsamps < the_params.mch_number_of_samples) 
00180           {
00181               Message(ERROR)<< "Not enough samples in input file !!!\n";
00182               return -1;
00183           }
00184           idx = id*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00185           if(s_start < 0) 
00186           {
00187               s_start_max = nsamps-the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00188               s_start = ran.Uniform(0, s_start_max);
00189               s_end = s_start + the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00190           }
00191           int ii = 0;
00192           
00193           for(int isamp=s_start; isamp<s_end; isamp++) 
00194           {
00195               histPMT[idx+ii] = 4095 - chdata->waveform[isamp];
00196               ii++;
00197           }
00198       }
00199       
00200   }
00201   
00202   // photoelectrons from laser
00203   for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00204   {
00205       idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00206       barePMT[idx+the_params.mch_trigger_delay] = ran.Poisson(poisson_mean);
00207   }
00208   
00209   double ser_norm;
00210   
00211 
00212   // Convert photoelectrons (from laser and random hits) to signal
00213   for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) 
00214   {
00215       idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00216       for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) 
00217       {
00218           if(barePMT[idx+itime] == 0) continue;
00219           for(int iphe=0;iphe<barePMT[idx+itime]; iphe++) 
00220           {//For each photoelectron:
00221 
00222               //Determine amplitude of pulse
00223               if(ran.Uniform() < P_E) 
00224               {    // Exponential tail
00225                   ser_norm = - TMath::Log(ran.Uniform(0.0, 1.0))*exp_tau;
00226               } 
00227               else 
00228               {   //Gaussian component
00229                   ser_norm = ran.Gaus(spe_mean, spe_sigma);
00230               }
00231               ser_norm /= ser_integral;
00232              
00233               //Get time profile from profile saved in mc/include/averageSPE.hh
00234               int ioff,ptime;
00235               ioff = xtime_ser - xtime_start;
00236               for(int is=xtime_start; is<xtime_end; is++) 
00237               {
00238                   ptime = itime - ioff + is - xtime_start;
00239                   if(ptime>=0 && ptime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples) 
00240                       histPMT[idx+ptime] += pmt_ser[is]*ser_norm;
00241               }
00242           }
00243       }
00244   }
00245   
00246   unsigned int *bufint = (unsigned int*) buffer;
00247   unsigned int x1,x2;
00248   int count;
00249 
00250   count = 0;
00251 
00252   for(Int_t ii=0; ii<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; ii++) 
00253   {
00254       idx = ii*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00255       for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime+=2) 
00256       {
00257           x1 = (unsigned int) (histPMT[idx+itime  ] + 0.5);
00258           x2 = (unsigned int) (histPMT[idx+itime+1] + 0.5);
00259           if(x1 & 0xFFFFF000) x1 = 0xFFF;
00260           if(x2 & 0xFFFFF000) x2 = 0xFFF;
00261           
00262           x1 = 4095 - x1;
00263           x2 = 4095 - x2;
00264           
00265           bufint[count++] = x1 | (x2 << 16);
00266       }
00267   }
00268   
00269   mcwriter->Process(MCEventPtr(new MCEvent(raw))); //< writes event to disk
00270   mc_written++;
00271   
00272   return 0;
00273 }

00278 
00279   return 0;

00281 
00282 int MCLaserData::End_Run()
00283 {
00284   Message(INFO) << "MCLaserData End \n";
00285 
00286   // RunDB::runinfo *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00287   // rinfo->endtime = time(NULL);
00288 
00289   mcwriter->SetSaveConfig(true);
00290 
00291   ParameterList *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00292 
00293   the_runinfo.runid = the_params.mch_run_number;
00294   the_runinfo.events = mc_written;
00295 
00296   the_runinfo.type = "laser";
00297 
00298   // RunDB::runinfo::channelinfo *cinfo = rinfo->GetChannelInfo(1);
00299   // if(cinfo != NULL) std::cout << "found" << std::endl;
00300 
00301   MC_RunInfo::channelinfo cinfo;
00302   for(int ii=0; ii<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; ii++) {
00303     cinfo.amplification = 10;
00304     cinfo.channel = ii;
00305     cinfo.spe_mean = spe_mean;
00306     cinfo.spe_sigma = spe_sigma;
00307     cinfo.reload_cal=false;
00308     cinfo.reload_cal_run=false;
00309     cinfo.calibration_channel=ii;
00310     cinfo.calibration_run=the_params.mch_run_number-1;
00311     cinfo.voltage=1323;
00312     the_runinfo.channels.push_back(cinfo);
00313   }
00314 
00315   the_runinfo.endtime = time(NULL);
00316 
00317   rinfo->RegisterParameter("runinfo", the_runinfo, "");
00318   rinfo->RegisterParameter("MC_Params", the_params, "");
00319 
00320   mcwriter->Finalize();
00321   return 0;
00322 }
